com.team3824.akmessing1.scoutingapp.activities

Class EventView

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.team3824.akmessing1.scoutingapp.activities.EventView

  • public class EventView
extends Activity
    This activity shows a table comparing all the teams at the current event. There is a dropdown menu to select the criteria upon which to compare teams.
